text.english: Save Your people, And bless Your inheritance; Shepherd them also, And bear them up forever. The LORD is their strength, And He is the saving refuge of His anointed.
text.arabic: خَلِّصْ شَعْبَكَ وَبَارِكْ مِيرَاثَكَ وَارْعَهُم وَاحْمِلْهُم إِلَى الأَبَدِ. الرَّبُّ عِزٌّ لَهُمْ وَحِصْنُ خَلاَصِ مَسِيحِهِ هُوَ.
